name.title: Wallet Name
name.caption: Give your wallet a recognisable name.

account.title: Number of accounts
account.caption: Specify the number of accounts to create.
account.description: A wallet in $t(common:appName) can have up to {{accountLimit}} accounts. Each account can be delegated to a different stake pool. The account keys are generated from the wallet root key.
account.tooltip: Each added account increases the syncing time, accounts can be added at any time.

create.title: Creating wallet
create.caption: Please wait whilst the wallet is being generated

password.title: Set spending password
password.caption: Choose a long password. The longer it is, the safer your funds.

status.exists: Wallet already exists, redirecting to wallet.
